contents:
64 Gets worse and worse for Michael Wolff the more Coulter reads. It's pretty clear that Wolff wasn't particularly bothered by anything Epstein did, was in effect on his team. Mainly seems to care about slagging Trump. Did he visit Epstein's ... properties? (anncoulter.substack.com) posted 6 hours ago by kinbergfan 2 comments award share report block Michael Wolff to Epstein: Be anti-Trump for political cover "It’s a chance to make the story about something other than you..." anncoulter.substack.com
2 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save PatPede1 2 points 5 hours ago The more you know about how this milieu of people spend their lives, the more vomit it induces. permalink award report block reply Zennbrown 1 points 4 hours ago Thanks for posting this. I'm no fan of Ann but she is reading the tea leaves. She is climbing back on the Trump train. All a board! Good to see since many others constantly bash the guy who took a bullet for us. permalink award report block reply
